setKernelCallback

public void setKernelCallback(DesktopKernel dk)
Desktop is occasionally going to ask the kernel to launch an app.
Parameters:
dk -  

createFrimble

public Frimble createFrimble(java.lang.String title)
Each implemntation of WindowManager may have a different concept of containment for apps. Some will use JFrames, some may use JInternalFrames Others may be custom displays..... e.g. Imagine a JTabbedPane with each tab being an app, right click on the itslef for close/minimise actions...... nahh!
Parameters:
title -  
Returns:
